EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Join Us for The PCS Mobile Pit Stop on Wednesday Evening! Wednesday, September 26 from 8:00 PM - 11:00 PM Hello {{lead.First Name:default=TriCON Attendee}},
Come by and visit with the PCS Mobile and the In Motion team and enjoy a cocktail on us along with some late-night munchies. What a great way to enjoy the San Diego Gaslamp District!
Register in advance for your complimentary drink coupon and treasure key. We'll have it waiting at our booth on Wednesday. <http://www.pcsmobile.com/Tricon2012/PCSMobilePitStop.aspx> While enjoying your beverage during the event, try your luck at opening our Treasure Chest. There’s a $50 Gift Card inside and if your key works, you can take it home with you!
The PCS Mobile team supports your mobility by providing products and services to ensure your TriTech Software is working effectively in a field application. We specialize in mobile voice, video, and data products. See some of our newest solutions during TriCon 2012 – BOOTH #30. How do you find us? Look for the booth with the orange safety cones!
